txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'There were always nests and webs within the Creeping Wood, but they were kept to the corners and the side-caves. Recently, I think emboldened by the dark presence of the Enemy, the spiders have begun to fill all the tunnels and caves.\n\n'We cannot risk the spiders growing and leaving the Creeping Wood. Their numbers must be culled.'
'I have never liked spiders, not even the little ones.'
'Be wary that you do not get caught up within the webs of the Creeping Wood yourself.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
The Creeping Wood: A Fear of Spiders
The spiders of the Creeping Wood have grown bold since the Enemy arrived in Rohan.
Defeated spiders in the Creeping Wood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat spiders in the Creeping Wood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Spiders can be found in the Creeping Wood.\n\nWaldeg asked you to defeat several spiders within the Creeping Wood.
Waldeg is at Snowbourn.\n\nWaldeg will be pleased to know that few spiders now skitter through the tunnels of the Creeping Wood.
